summary: Face a horizon of forgotten myths, sunken relics and mysterious creatures! Fly, shoot and explore your way up the Sidereal Riptide, a dark expanse of water and the cradle of infinite drifting islands.

name: Avian Colony
summary: Avian Colony is a survival simulation game that places you in the role of the ruler of a floating colony in a harsh sky world. Your main goal is to ensure the survival and prosperity of your colony by managing resources, planning strategically, and defending against threats.

name: A Very Dark Ride in the Proximity of the House of Mirrors
summary: A vewy scawy horror, adventure PCVR game played through the eyes of Eve, a little girl with a big imagination. Run, hide, swim and scream your way into her horrible nightmares while navigating through surreal worlds and creatures. Puzzles, stealth, games and fame await you. Try not to wake up!

name: Avventura nel Castello
summary: Avventura nel Castello is a 1982 text adventure game by Enrico Colombini and Chiara Tovena, the first to be created and sold commercially by an Italian author, later included with the Apple II itself.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - The Sky Breaker
summary: A mysterious shadow looms in the sky, threatening the Na’vi clans below who are celebrating at their great festival of games. Face the RDA and protect the unity of the clans.

name: Avian Enigma
summary: Avian enigma is a sci-fi visual novel game featuring in a world where birds have become extinct. The story begins with a young man working in a factory accidentally saves a bird. Soon, a girl who has a mysterious relationship with birds appears in front of him. A romance with a tiny twist begins.

name: Avocado
summary: Avocado is a clicker game made with the next generation in green technology, in which you click an avocado! In Avocado you click the avocado to obtain even more avocados! Drop new and exciting avocados to trade with your friends! Come and enjoy yourself as a part of the Avocado gang!

name: Avatar: Realms Collide
summary:
A time of peace and harmony is disrupted by a dangerous cult devoted to a dark entity from the Spirit World. As the cult’s power and influence grows across the land, so too does chaos, wreaking havoc and consuming lives, leaving the ashes of formerly serene societies in its wake.

Now, you must face your destiny and embark on an epic journey to recruit powerful benders from across the land, discover heroes of legend and forge alliances with other powerful leaders to restore harmony and balance to the world!

name: Avalanche Escape
summary:
While resting in a mountain hut, you encounter an avalanche.
Escape from the hut!

name: A Very Scandalous Proposal
summary: A Very Scandalous Proposal is the first and only book of the A Very Scandalous Proposal series.

name: Avali: Final Battle
summary: Avali: Final Battle is a first person shooter game developed by CL3NRc2 primarily featuring the colloquially known "cute fluffy space raptors"; the "Avali". Originally a creation in SPORE, they rose in popularity because of a mod for the game "Starbound" and even further thanks to models created for VRChat.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Season Pass
summary: The Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora Season Pass includes: - Story Pack #1: The Sky Breaker - Story Pack #2: Secrets of the Spires - Bonus Quest: Familiar Echoes - Resistance Banshee Mount - Resistance Equipment Pack

name: Avianos
summary:
In a time when birds rule, an epic war rages between the red talons and the blue beaks.
Game available on UFO 50.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Secrets of the Spire
summary: Epic aerial battles await in the Spires of the Clouded Forest, a spectacular new mountainous region in Pandora's Western Frontier.

name: A Void Society
summary:
THE new series phenomenon for mobile where YOU are part of the story!
Fans of Mystery and Thriller Games, take note: This is a story that will grab you and never let you go! Set out on an enthralling adventure and piece together how the apocalypse unfolded!

name: A Very Splendid Otome Game
summary: Please help yourselves to the splendiferous SPLENDIDEST OTOGE. To summarize the game, it's about falling in love with a cake. A very splendid cake. The heroine's name is randomized or optionally set by the player.

name: Avante! Atlantis
summary: Avante! Atlantis is a turn-based strategy game with a board game aesthetic. Capture territory, deploy units, and outmaneuver rivals in tactical battles. Every move counts as you fight for control of a resurged land rich in resources...and full of secrets.

name: Avowed: Premium Edition
summary:
Premium Edition includes:
- Avowed base game
- Up to 5 days early access
- Two Premium Skin Packs
- Access to Avowed Digital Artbook & Original Soundtrack

name: A Very Thiefy Christmas Special
summary: Grab a hot cup of peppermint cocoa and snuggle into your favorite holiday jammies for a comfy, cozy little Christmas mission.

name: Avon
summary: An Interactive Fiction adventure by Jon Thackray and Dr. Jonathan Partington for the IBM System/370 'Phoenix' mainframe system at the University of Cambridge.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Sky Rider Starter Pack
summary:
The Sky Rider Starter Pack includes a banshee set and 3,250 tokens to unlock new gear, weapons, and more!
The banshee set includes three different color patterns to customize your banshee.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Storm Chaser Starter Pack
summary: The Storm Chaser Starter Pack includes a cosmetic bioluminescent banshee paint override, character set, weapon set and 4,600 tokens to unlock new gear, weapons, banshee gear, and more!

name: Avenir Tower
summary: Avenir Tower is a platforming game where you attempt to reach the top of a giant structure known as the Avenir Tower.

name: A Very Ordinary Elevator Simulator
summary: A Very Ordinary Elevator Simulator is an easter egg hunt walking simulator where you climb the floors, going higher and higher, in a seemingly ordinary elevator. Features over an hour of gameplay, multiple endings, minigames, collectibles, achievements, easter eggs, and many unique sights to see. Do you dare uncover the secrets of The Elevator?

name: Avenge Myself
summary: Reject gravity. Go fast. A speedrunning FPS with gravity-defying physics-based movement. Find your own routes through stages and move like you've never moved before.

name: A Very Simple Puzzle...
summary: Discover a simple and relaxing solitaire with A Very Simple Puzzle. Match three cubes of the same color to unlock the next one. Can you reach the final cube? With its minimalist aesthetic and laid-back gameplay, this game is perfect for a short, zen break, and can be completed in around two hours.

name: A Very Merry Nightmare
summary: A First-Person 3D Christmas Thriller Game

name: Avoidy Virus
summary: Survive lockdown with 4-16 players in this viral co-op game of tag. Avoid the virus, grab vaccines, and save your fellow humans. But beware - get sick and you'll join the viral invasion!

name: Avara Aftershock 1.5
summary:
Avara Aftershock is a standalone modification of Avara, made by fans with the blessing of Ambrosia Software.

Primarily inspired by Team Fortress, Aftershock features different classes with their own strengths and weaknesses, with a focus on team play.

There is also an entirely new set of levels built-in, there are some interface alterations, there's a new splash screen, and there has been some visual and audio alterations/enhancements.

name: Aviãozinho do tráfico 1: despacito 5 quem ler é arrombado 2
Aviãozinho do tráfico 2: 3D resenha de pasta base de cocaína com Sorrizo Ronaldo
AVTale
summary: AVTale is a cooperative platformer for two players on one screen or online. Two heroes find themselves in a dark cave full of secrets and dangers. One can only fight, the other can support the ally. Together, solve puzzles, fight monsters and much more!

name: Avalone's Adventurers: My Parents were Assassinated so I've Started an Adventuring Party to Avoid a Political Marriage
summary: Marianne Avalone just inherited her parent's adventuring business, but she's not suited to adventuring! It's time to sort through the party applications, hire the best, and assign them to profitable quests. She needs to earn gold quickly to cancel her engagement to the duke's son!

name: AV Director Life!
summary: AV production simulation game you can freely film, edit, and sell your creations! Work with charming heroines to produce top-tier masterpieces, boost your reputation, and grow your sales. Striving to pay off your debts, take on the fiery challenge of reaching the top of the industry as a director!

name: AVICI
summary: AVICI is a Rogueliek-based FPS game in the Doomlike style. Players will become warrior Nypia, using the power of sins to fight against the totalitarian organization in a dystopian society. While finding the sinister conspiracy behind the Avici Tower, you will uncover her own hidden origins.

name: Average Human Ball Game
summary: A Fighting game and a sports game merged together to create a high energy point based fighting game

name: Avoren
summary: You are assigned to explore worlds and realms totally lost to sanity, face mystical creatures with elemental powers, and try to stay alive! Find fuel and keep the train going!

name: Ave Classic
summary: Ave Classic is a productivity support tool game featuring personified classical music characters. It helps you create a focused work environment with a Pomodoro timer and background music for work.

name: Avali Race Mod
summary: The cutest predators this side of the universe rift

name: Avernum 4: Greed and Glory
summary: The cult-classic saga is back! Battle for fame, power, and wealth in the subterranean nation of Avernum. Conquer an enormous underworld in this epic turn-based fantasy RPG. Features huge, clever dungeons, varied and cunning foes, 100s of artifacts to find or craft, and a really cool story.

name: Ave Trail
summary: 2D survival game against hordes of zombies. Go on missions, gather resources, upgrade your village or develop a cure to save humanity. Choose to run, build… or fight.

name: Avitium
summary: Play as a knight unraveling his relationships with kingdom, king, and country in this card battler RPG. Make your convictions known through tricktaking gameplay and defend them in turn-based combat.

name: AVA
summary: AVA is an adventure game where the protagonist is a girl resident of the world “Koyte”. The heroine has to get out of the dungeon and find out what happened to the world.

name: AV Company
summary: Nanako came to an abandoned Audio & Video company alone She needs to find some important documents in the ruins What's the use of those documents?...

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - From the Ashes
summary: Avatar Frontiers of Pandora: From the Ashes sees players embark on the journey of So’lek, a battle-hardened Na’vi warrior from the Trr’ong clan. Ambushed and left for dead by the RDA and their new allies—the ruthless Ash clan—So’lek awakens to a world in flames and his Sarentu family scattered.

name: Avril
summary: Welcome to my first project! Step into a haunted apartment complex where nothing is as it seems. What begins as a search for your missing sister quickly spirals into a nightmare of jumpscares, puzzles, and a descent a place where unspeakable dark rituals were performed.

name: Avatar Legends: The Fighting Game
summary: Avatar Legends: The Fighting Game is a fast-paced 1v1 fighter where you battle as your favorite characters from the Avatar franchise. Featuring hand-drawn 2D animation true to the series’ roots, proprietary rollback netcode, and full cross-play for smooth, competitive gameplay.

name: A Very British Summer
summary: A darkly comic life-sim where players manage a small-town doctor's daily life, solving puzzles to treat patients, navigating village activities, and choosing whether to follow the law or indulge in crime and chaos on the path to fortune.

name: Ava
summary: Ava is a RPG, Horror game about a man named John, who doesn't remember where he is or how he got there, but slowly as you progress, you learn about his past and how...…confusing it is. But do you really want to know the truth?

name: Avemary Rocket: Captain Patchwork
summary: Join our brave captain on this action adventure in space! You'll be riding The Patchwork, a less than ideal spaceship, but enough to get away from pursuers. However, you'll be facing malfunctions, fires, enemies attacking... When it rains, it pours.

name: Avoid Game
summary: Avoid Game is a simple yet addictive dodge action game! Control the black cat to dodge raindrops. Experience easy controls, infinite survival, and randomly spaced obstacles as you challenge your best high score!

name: Ava's Variations
summary: A choice-driven story about a rising pro tennis player. Shape Ava’s career, relationships, and future in the moments that change everything.

name: Avenging Angel Hikari Akeldama
summary:
Since the dawn of mankind, Heaven has been waging a war against the demonic forces of Hell through the use of child soldiers-turned-bioweapons known as "Angels".

The year is 201X. In the city of Bethel, when the leader of the St. Abraham's High School Angel Brigade, Hikari Akeldama, begins to unravel the dark truth of the war she's been fighting for years, what she discovers will drive a wedge between her and the rest of the platoon as she tries to find the answer to an age-old question:

Is it better to reign in Hell than to serve in Heaven?

name: Average Routine
summary: Average Routine is an anime themed turn-based RPG. In the game, you act as Era, meeting new friends around the school. Invite, upgrade your character, and overcome a variety of challenges!
